mapper.insert: insert into room_member (room_ID, account_ID, timecost, percentage) VALUES (#{Rid}, #{Aid}, 0, 0.00)
mapper.select: select room_ID, account_ID, timecost, percentage from room_member where room_ID = #{Rid} order by percentage desc, timecost
select account_nickname from account where account_ID in ( select account_ID from room_member where room_ID = #{Rid} )
